message: I ask because I don't want to depend upon a product that might just be a fly-by-night.

In case you haven't noticed, convore has been abandoned. It's sad :( but maybe there is some underlying design flaw, which became apparent only when load peaked some time in early summer or after the database(s) grew, and would take remaking the whole damn thing from scratch to fix. I can't think of any other reason for abandoning it.
